name: priority::high
description: Highest priority. Should be handled as quick as posibble

name: priority::medium
description: Medium priority. Normal workflow but should be handled before issues without priority label

name: priority::low
description: Lowest priority. Can wait, you should consider looking for unlabeled issues before handle this

name: status::abandoned
description: Discontinue any further interest in this subject

name: status::blocked
description: This subject is blocked by other(s) that need to be resolved before continue

name: status::on-hold
description: There is a delay in completing the issue

name: status::proposal
description: This is more discussion about concept

name: status::review-needed
description: Should be reviewed by core team member

name: status::need-more-info
description: More information is required (in most cases from author)

name: type::enhancement
description: Propose improvements to existing features or creating new one that is wanted by team

name: type::duplicated
description: Identical subject was already created. This one is duplicated
